addressable_light_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the addressable light component to use as a display.

*See also: [Addressable Light](https://esphome.io/components/display/addressable_light.html#configuration-variables)*

width.docs:
**int**: The width of the LED matrix in pixels.

*See also: [Addressable Light](https://esphome.io/components/display/addressable_light.html#configuration-variables)*

height.docs:
**int**: The height of the LED matrix in pixels.

*See also: [Addressable Light](https://esphome.io/components/display/addressable_light.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to call the lambda to update the display. Defaults to `16ms`.

*See also: [Addressable Light](https://esphome.io/components/display/addressable_light.html#configuration-variables)*

pixel_mapper.docs:
**[lambda](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-lambda)**: A lambda that returns the integer address of the LED given the supplied the `x` and `y` pixel coordinate. By default, a left-to-right direct pixel mapper is used.

*See also: [Addressable Light](https://esphome.io/components/display/addressable_light.html#configuration-variables)*
